special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.
